title: Dubai-based Jumeirah Group to double property portfolio by 2030; 'keen' on opening luxury hotel in India
description: Dubai-based luxury hotel chain Jumeirah Group plans to double its property portfolio by 2030 and is interested in opening a luxury hotel in India, according to Kirti Anchan, General Manager of Jumeirah Emirates Towers. The company sees India as a key market and believes there is a growing demand for ultra-luxury hotels.
